Method Detail

getTags

java.util.List<SKOSConcept> getTags(java.lang.String path,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> vocabularies,
                                    SKOSSearcher searcher,
                                    int maxTerms,
                                    int minOccur)
Returns a list of SKOSConcept objects for the specified file using the specified vocabularies and SKOSSearcher implementation.

Parameters:
path - Path to the file
vocabularies - List of vocabularies
searcher - Searcher implementation
maxTerms - Maximum number of terms
minOccur - Minimum number of times a phrase/term must occur
Returns:

getTags

java.util.List<SKOSConcept> getTags(java.net.URL url,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> vocabularies,
                                    SKOSSearcher searcher,
                                    int maxHops,
                                    int maxTerms,
                                    boolean diff,
                                    int minOccur)
Returns a list of SKOSConcept objects for the specified URL using the specified vocabularies and SKOSSearcher implementation. The maximum number of hops indicates the number of levels of links to be crawled/traversed when indexing the site.

Parameters:
url - URL of desired web site
vocabularies - List of vocabularies
searcher - Searcher implementation
maxHops - Maximum number of links to be traversed (hops)
maxTerms - Maximum number of terms
diff - Index only the differences between base page and subsequent pages
minOccur - Minimum number of times a phrase/term must occur
Returns:

setConfig

void setConfig(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration config)
